last_episode_to_air.name: Friends In Strange Places
last_episode_to_air.overview: Chris and Roxanne remain friends; Billy's parents fight.

name: Hillside
overview:
Hillside (known as Fifteen in the United States) is a Canadian-American teen drama that aired on YTV in Canada from 1991 to 1993. Created and produced by John T. Binkley, the series was Nickelodeon's only teenage soap opera. The show was shot on videotape, similar to most daytime dramas.

The series was first conceived as Fifteen in an improvised form for The Disney Channel,  where a 13-episode pilot series was produced and tested in the U.S.  After Disney decided not to proceed with the project, Nickelodeon and  Canadian partners joined Binkley in producing the series which was known  in its first and second seasons as Hillside in Canada, and throughout the 65-episode run as Fifteen in the U.S. The show was subsequently syndicated around the world, with runs in Germany and Israel, among others.

The series features a large ensemble cast which underwent several changes over the show's four-season run. Notable cast members include Laura Harris, Enuka Okuma, and Ryan Reynolds.

episodes.name: Checking It Out
episodes.overview: Brooke checks out Matt who obviously belongs to Ashley.  Dylan faces off with Matt.  Sparks fly.  Brooke tries to flirt with Dylan, but it falls flat and she’s back to plotting with Kelly. After Courtney hems and haws, she finally drops a bombshell on Billy.

episodes.name: Stirring the Pot
episodes.overview: Courtney confides in Jake about her parents’ problems.   Matt and Ashley are doing just fine until Brooke tries to stir up trouble.  Trouble is brewing for Matt with Coach  Williams but we’re not sure why at first.  Billy’s sucking up to Dylan until Matt interrupts.

episodes.name: The Dislocated Swede
episodes.overview: Matt and Ashley try to put the pieces back together while Brooke plots furiously.  Olaf “dislocates” himself.  Jake tries to get up the nerve to ask Courtney out.  Matt finds Dylan talking to Ashley.  Dylan lets Billy try his drums.  Ashley is shocked to find Matt at the Avalon with Brooke.

episodes.name: True Friends
episodes.overview: Billy and Courtney wrestle with their parents’ issues.  Ashley is torn up over her doubts about Matt.  Jake tries to help Matt sort things out.  Courtney’s not sure it’s good for Billy to be “hanging around Dylan.”  Brooke blames her dirty tricks on Kelly.  Courtney thinks she has a chance with Dylan.

episodes.name: Free Falling
episodes.overview: Matt takes heat from Coach Williams.  Theresa bugs Brooke.  Courtney falls for Dylan.  Brooke can’t resist sticking her nose in again.  Jake wants desperately to tell Courtney how he feels.  Now Theresa fantasizes about Dylan.  Courtney and Billy’s parents make it final.  Ashley makes a shocking discovery..

episodes.name: Waiting In The Wings
episodes.overview: Matt’s drinking raises new questions.  Does Ashley dare confront him?  Courtney and Billy compete for Dylan’s attention.  But Jake’s in the wings wishing Courtney would notice him. Dylan’s upcoming school concert creates new tensions.  Courtney surprises Brooke over at Dylan’s.

episodes.name: Temperature's Rising
episodes.overview: Matt gets benched.  Brooke brags to Kelly how she upstaged Courtney with Dylan.  Billy can’t find anyone to talk to but Olaf.  Courtney asks Ashley for advice.  Matt tries to start a fight with Dylan.  Matt hides a problem at school and Ashley confronts him.  Courtney’s fantasy life flourishes.

episodes.name: Lean On Me
episodes.overview: Ashley leans on Jake for help with Matt but how’s he supposed to help.  Courtney provokes a fight with Dylan.  Cyndi and Olaf’s attempts to save the environment meet with a feeble response at Hillside.  Courtney makes up with Dylan and she and Billy plan to throw a party.  Naturally, Brooke tosses a grenade into the plans and Jake has to pick up the pieces.

episodes.name: The Green-Eyed Monster
episodes.overview: Billy defends his dad with Courtney.  Jake confides in Ashley.  Matt makes fun of the “Environmental Police,” while Brooke uses the cause for her own ends.  Billy isn’t sure whether to be friends with Olaf.  Dylan’s concert is cancelled and Billy is responsible.  Ashley’s feeling sorry for Dylan makes Matt jealous.

episodes.name: The Party
episodes.overview: Matt’s tension with the Coach worsens and, unlikely as it is, Matt tries to give Jake romantic advice.  Olaf has a theory about Bart Simpson.  Jake tries a new approach with Courtney.  Brook pursues her ambition to be Student Council President.  Ashley tries to help Matt but Matt hits a wall with the coach.  The Party at Courtney and Billy’s ends with a shock.

episodes.name: Damage Control
episodes.overview: There’s a need for damage control after the Party but Brooke still has her eye on the election.  Matt and Ashley have different takes on his “falling down drunk.”  Jake finally asks Courtney out and tries to help Ashley with Matt.  Cyndi gives Dylan some advice.  Ashley wants to help Matt but Brooke manages to get there first.

episodes.name: Hanging In the Balance
episodes.overview: Ashley and Matt’s relationship is on the rocks.  Matt loses his patience with Jake and their friendship is put to the test.  Brooke pretends to sympathize with Ashley.  Courtney rejects Dylan’s attempts to make up.  Ashley cheats on a test and Brooke and Kelly are quick to rub it in.  Billy gets back in with Dylan.

episodes.name: The Worm Turns
episodes.overview: Everyone’s worried about Ashley and her parents are about to ruin her life.  Brooke ramps up her campaign for Student Council President.  To help matters, Kelly starts flirting with Dylan.  Billy does a double take when Theresa takes an interest in him.  Dylan surprises Billy with a major offer.  Jake hasn’t given up on helping Matt.  Kelly sets Brooke up for a fall.  Dylan’s determined to build up his band.

episodes.name: Changes
episodes.overview: Ashley remains absent from school after getting caught cheating and plans to transfer to private school. Courtney and Arseman plan a farewell gathering for Ashley.

episodes.name: Siblings
episodes.overview: Concerned about him, Courtney decides to spend some time with Matt. Chris argues with Dylan over Billy's talent at drumming. Matt's sister Erin and transfer student Janice both have trouble fitting in at Hillside.

episodes.name: Crossed Swords
episodes.overview: Matt considers asking his basketball coach to let him back on the team. Brooke catches Matt accidentally reading Courtney's private letter. Chris spreads a rumor to Amanda about Billy's status with the band.

episodes.name: Trouble In The Band
episodes.overview: Dylan can't figure out why Billy is so upset with him. Brooke makes a new friend in Stacy. Arseman questions Courtney if there's something more between her and Matt than friendship. Erin wants to attend a sleepover. Dylan spots a familiar face at the Avalon.

episodes.name: Circles
episodes.overview: Courtney tries to interpret Matt's intentions when he asks her to a movie. Gossip spreads when Dylan asks Janice over to his garage after school.

episodes.name: Scrambled
episodes.overview: Ashley returns to Hillside, complicating things between Matt and Courtney. Billy struggles to ask Amanda out, but she questions his maturity.

episodes.name: Intrigue
episodes.overview: Rising tensions puts Courtney and Ashley's friendship in jeopardy. Stacy offers Brooke advice on improving her reputation. Dylan and Chris decide to seek a lead singer for the band. Billy tries to impress girls by boasting about masculine feats.

episodes.name: Misunderstandings
episodes.overview: Dylan talks Ashley into a singing audition. Brooke takes Stacy clothes shopping. Billy bats around the idea of asking Ashley out. Matt's past issues are brought back into question.

episodes.name: Trios
episodes.overview: Dylan's band gets an audition for a gig, but they still lack a lead singer. Matt is suspicious of Dylan and Ashley's friendship. Billy asks Dylan for advice on impressing women. Janice confides in Courtney.

episodes.name: Newcomer To The Band
episodes.overview: Dylan and Chris make an inappropriate bet. Courtney has a valuable stolen from her locker. Arseman badgers Ashley about an unintended comment made about Chris.

episodes.name: Secret Admirer
episodes.overview: Janice remains under suspicion for the theft of Courtney's necklace. When Arseman discovers Dylan and Chris's bet, she decides to turn the tables on them. Billy attempts to woo Ashley with a gift.

episodes.name: First Gig
episodes.overview: Following the band's concert at the Avalon, Dylan and Chris overevaluate their performance. Brooke discovers a surprising secret that Amanda has been keeping.

episodes.name: Exposure
episodes.overview: With the true thief caught, Courtney tries to make amends with Janice. Roxanne advises Chris to drop Billy from the band. Ashley takes Chris's advice to heart.

episodes.name: Welcome Home Party
episodes.overview: Courtney looks forward to Jake’s return from China, but doesn’t know where she stands with him. Chris convinces Dylan to make a firm decision about Billy’s status in the band. Dave is concerned that Matt is taking up his old habits again.

episodes.name: No More Secrets
episodes.overview: New relationships are scrutinized amongst the students of Hillside. Billy deals with his emotions after being dropped from the band. Arseman angrily confronts Dylan and Chris over the decision. Jake approaches Matt about his recent behavior, but the encounter gets hostile.

episodes.name: Intervention
episodes.overview: Ashley is uneasy about Chris and Roxanne hanging out. Brooke aspires to audition for the band’s new lead singer. Matt’s friends decide to confront him about his drinking problem.

episodes.name: Fox Stole
episodes.overview: Erin is troubled about Matt’s departure to a substance abuse treatment center. Ashley feels guilty that she’s letting her concerns affect her relationship with Chris. After Brooke pranks Arseman over her activism, John and Stacy conspire to pull a prank of their own.

episodes.name: New Lead
episodes.overview: Courtney worries about Billy’s state of mind after hearing their father is remarrying. Dylan is not thrilled with Chris’s choice for the band’s new lead singer. Ashley’s friends speculate on her distant behavior. John tries his hand buzzer prank on the wrong person.

episodes.name: Coming Home
episodes.overview: The students prepare for the school’s talent content. Ashley encourages Courtney to change her image. Brooke joins the cheerleading team to get Dylan’s attention. Billy’s attitude takes a turn for the worst when he begins to bully other students.

episodes.name: Talent Show
episodes.overview: Courtney begins to question if her affection for Jake is merely platonic. Never having hired her, Dylan attempts to cut Roxanne from the band. Brooke misinterprets Dylan’s sarcasm as legitimate interest in a lunch date.

episodes.name: Feelings
episodes.overview: Courtney convinces Dylan to talk to Billy about his changed attitude. Arseman discovers Courtney’s lack of romantic feelings for Jake may not entirely be exclusive. Brooke seeks the vacated head cheerleader role, but the squad has a different candidate in mind. Chris capitalizes on an opportunity that Dylan is forced to turn down.

episodes.name: Head Cheerleader
episodes.overview: Courtney seeks actors for a play she’s producing. While Dylan struggles with school, a music opportunity opens up for him. Brooke finds out that Stacy is running against her for head cheerleader. Courtney confesses strong feelings for a student returning to Hillside.

episodes.name: Betrayed
episodes.overview: Dave wants to impress Stacy, while Courtney comes along with an opportunity for exposure. Billy turns his angst on David after he stands up for John. Courtney approaches Matt about going to Dylan’s gig as more than just friends.

episodes.name: Dropout
episodes.overview: Brooke is incensed when she believes a mean-spirited character in Courtney’s play is based on her. Courtney chooses to protect Ashley at the expense of Matt’s feelings. Dylan makes a rash decision about his future.

episodes.name: Truth Hurts
episodes.overview: Dave receives acclaim for his performance during the play. Brooke intends to use Chris to get under Roxanne’s skin. When Dylan hears about Billy’s bullying, he decides to make an example of him.

episodes.name: Back Together
episodes.overview: Brooke is excited about departing Hillside for Paris until she realizes what she’s leaving behind. Ashley and Matt are conflicted about their feelings for one another. Billy makes amends for his past actions. Dylan begins to regret his decision to drop out of school.

episodes.name: Male Bonding
episodes.overview: Couples disagree; Dylan is defensive about dropping out of school.

episodes.name: 10 Things We Hate About Each Other
episodes.overview: Matt and Ashley make up; Arseman's grandmother dies.

episodes.name: The Tip Of My Tongue
episodes.overview: Everyone consoles Arseman; Jennifer and Jason transfer to Hillside.

episodes.name: The Things We Do For Friends
episodes.overview: Roxanne and Chris' concert flops; Billy ridicules Jason.

episodes.name: It's A Complicated, Confusing, Frustrating, Yet Wonderful Life
episodes.overview: Dylan seeks work; Roxanne spurns Chris.

episodes.name: Just As The Clock Strikes Twelve
episodes.overview: Dylan and Arseman have problems; a theft occurs on Dylan's shift.

episodes.name: And To You My Past, I Bid Farewell
episodes.overview: Dylan is fired; Ashley and Matt break up; Dylan moves in with Matt.

episodes.name: Life...Or Something Along Those Lines
episodes.overview: Billy and Dylan suspect each other.

episodes.name: Don't Know Why
episodes.overview: The couples solve their problems; Dylan gets his job back.

episodes.name: Find Yourself
episodes.overview: Relationships show strain; Ashley and Matt plan a party.

episodes.name: On My Own
episodes.overview: Jason gets revenge; Ashley and Dylan are attracted.

episodes.name: Talent Quest
episodes.overview: Tensions arise about the triangle.

episodes.name: A Sentimental Journey
episodes.overview: Dylan moves out; Chris confronts Billy.

episodes.name: Jennifer VS Men
episodes.overview: Matt and Ashley break up; a new girl comes to school.

episodes.name: Flying North For Winter
episodes.overview: Dave and Matt reminisce; Arseman parts with Dylan.

episodes.name: The Gala: Take Two
episodes.overview: Matt is depressed; Russ does Brittany's science project.

episodes.name: Start Another Big Riot
episodes.overview: Relationships show strain.

episodes.name: Cheatin' Trouble Blues
episodes.overview: Dylan and Ashley go out.

episodes.name: For We Are Young And Free
episodes.overview: Jennifer has a crush on Billy; Pepper scores a goal; Dylan returns to school.

episodes.name: Teaching Ms Heaton
episodes.overview: Matt prepares to move; Billy joins the football team.

episodes.name: Nice Work If You Can Get It
episodes.overview: Billy has a new stepbrother; Roxanne confronts Jennifer.

episodes.name: The More Things Change...
episodes.overview: Jennifer is jealous; Stacy ridicules Liz's poem.

episodes.name: Acting Out
episodes.overview: Pepper is concerned about Russ.

episodes.name: Opening Night
episodes.overview: Dave and Stacy make up; Russ has leukemia.

episodes.name: A Stroll through Memory Lane
episodes.overview: Russ conceals his problem; Dylan is with another girl.

episodes.name: Friends In Strange Places
episodes.overview: Chris and Roxanne remain friends; Billy's parents fight.
